amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following new section: Sec. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to remove any portion of the Mount Soledad Veterans Memorial in San Diego, California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to remove any portion of the Mount Soledad Veterans Memorial in San Diego, Califonia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bilbray amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bilbray amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Bilbray.
